description:
The GET /os-services API takes "host" and "binary" query filter parameters:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/3a5d592e607176f4159ff65b6df0e2b552156aaf/nova/api/openstack/compute/services.py#L54-L58

And novaclient exposes those filters:

https://docs.openstack.org/cli-reference/nova.html#nova-service-list

But they aren't documented in the API reference:

https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=list-compute-services-detail#list-compute-services
title: api-ref: GET /os-services does not describe host/binary request query filter parameters

comments.content:
The GET /os-services API takes "host" and "binary" query filter parameters:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/3a5d592e607176f4159ff65b6df0e2b552156aaf/nova/api/openstack/compute/services.py#L54-L58

And novaclient exposes those filters:

https://docs.openstack.org/cli-reference/nova.html#nova-service-list

But they aren't documented in the API reference:

https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=list-compute-services-detail#list-compute-services
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/473708
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/473708
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=ebb245edc234ffbc136286329bbf973296224ccf
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit ebb245edc234ffbc136286329bbf973296224ccf
Author: Kevin_Zheng <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jun 13 14:53:51 2017 +0800

    Add missing query filter params for GET /os-services API
    
    The GET /os-services API takes "host" and "binary" query filter
    parameters:
    
    https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/3a5d592e607176f4159ff65b6df0e2b552156aaf/nova/api/openstack/compute/services.py#L54-L58
    
    And novaclient exposes those filters:
    
    https://docs.openstack.org/cli-reference/nova.html#nova-service-list
    
    But they aren't documented in the API reference:
    
    https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=list-compute-services-detail#list-compute-services
    
    Change-Id: I0ed35404d93475538326d3020754a6f97f25d08c
    Closes-bug: #1697563
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 16.0.0.0b3 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
